definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: It's time to look for a new business model, he said.
sentences.chinese: 現在需要尋找新的商業模式，熊谷正敏說道。

sentences.english: Because commercial pattern is pendent , all jobs backwater not before.
sentences.chinese: 由於商業模式懸而未決，所有的工作都停滯不前。

sentences.english: How ca very you design your Business Model ?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是商業模式如何策畫？

sentences.english: Who would do the journalism if the established business model died?
sentences.chinese: 如果現有的商業模式死亡，新聞該如何自處？

sentences.english: It is predicted that witkey would evolve into a new business mode.
sentences.chinese: 據預測，威客將演變成爲一種新的商業模式。

sentences.english: There was a sense of progress in the technology, but the business model lagged.
sentences.chinese: 雖然在技術上是先進的，但在商業模式上卻是落後的。

sentences.english: Both are breakout businesses, with legions of devoted followers.
sentences.chinese: 兩者的商業模式都極具突破，擁有大批擁躉。

sentences.english: A second business model takes an equally contrarian approach to production.
sentences.chinese: 第二種商業模式採用了同樣相反的生產方式。

sentences.english: I like to call this the “less than free” business model.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡將這稱之爲“比免費更便宜”的商業模式。

sentences.english: Its long-tail business model gives even the smallest Web sites a chance to make money.
sentences.chinese: 其長尾型商業模式甚至給最小的網站一個賺錢的機會。

sentences.english: The bottom line is that newspapers are in crisis because of their flawed business model.
sentences.chinese: 報紙業陷入危機根本就是由不完善的商業模式造成的。

sentences.english: Once again, Groupon has built psychology into its business model.
sentences.chinese: 再一次，團扣網在其商業模式中利用了心理學。

sentences.english: However, melding the diverse parts of the business model would be a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 不過，將不同的商業模式合到一起會是個難題。

sentences.english: A second cause is the firm's business model.
sentences.chinese: 第二個原因就是名藥康德的商業模式。

sentences.english: Let me emphasize that the idea does not have to be complex.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們強調一點，這個商業模式不需要太複雜。

sentences.english: Second, what about the argument that private equity is a superior business model?
sentences.chinese: 第二，私募股權是一個優質的商業模式這個論點如何？

definition: to be in operation/to do business/(of train, bus etc) to be in service/operation/service
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
